description: This file defines a mock class 'Store2NotificationMock' for unit testing purposes, which implements the 'INotification' interface from the 'WPEFramework::Exchange::IStore2' namespace. It includes mock method definitions for 'ValueChanged' and setup for interface mapping.

classes.name: Store2NotificationMock
classes.description: A mock class for the INotification interface, used for unit testing event notifications related to store updates.

methods.name: ValueChanged
methods.description: Mock method to simulate the notification that a value has changed, with parameters for scope, namespace, key, and value.
